recipesJson.name: Sweetos Caramel
recipesJson.author: JAXXAN
recipesJson.description: The caramel version of the sweet Cheetos 'Sweetos'. I love these things. Butter heavy cinnamon and caramel flavor with a kind of corn cereal back note. Adjust Super Sweet to taste but I like it pretty sweet.

reviews.text: Mixed this up for my wife and she absolutely LOVES it! So therefore I have to give it a 5... She says it's one of her new favorites an ADV for sure! Nice job! üëçüëç
